tgt_original: śrīvajramaṇḍalālaṅkāre nigaditam- sarvatra sarvadhātau tu sarvasattvā[śca] sarvataḥ |  sarvakāyamayaṁ vyāpya cittadhāreva saṁsthitā || 48 ||
anāśravā[di]cintā ca nirmmalā nirmmamā svayam |  śūnyā gaganasamā caiva bhāvābhāvavivarjitā || 49 ||
sarvendriyaṁ ca vijñānaṁ cittaṁ sarvatra sarvataḥ || 51 ||
